amendment.description: Amendment authorizes an additional 6 months of extended unemployment compensation benefits through the Community Services Block Grant program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to insert provisions extending unemployment benefits for 6 months through the CDBG program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, George amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 179 (Roll no. 18).

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. George Miller.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. George Miller.
